info_points.title: Ariadne
info_points.description: Ariadne's central peak serves as the prime meridian of the planet. It is named after a princess from Greek mythology.

info_points.title: Dali Chasma
info_points.description: A distinct feature on Venus, the Dali Chasma is a system of dep troughts stretching 7,400km across the planet's surface.

info_points.title: Sapas Mons
info_points.description: A large volcano rising 1500m above the Atla Regio of Venus. Emmited lava can flow up to 330 km from it's centre!

info_points.title: Volcanic Planes
info_points.description: The surface of Venus is dominated by volcanic features and has more volcanos than any other planet in the solar system. Because of this, the surface is primarily made up of Basalt rock.

info_points.title: Maxwell Montes
info_points.description: The brightest mountain range on Venus. It contains Skadi Mons, it's tallest mountain.
